snippet: New York Knicks forward Carmelo Anthony said he believed there was an underlying issue with referee Tony Brothers that was the reason behind him being ejected from Friday's game against the Boston Celtics....
lead_paragraph: New York Knicks forward Carmelo Anthony said he believed there was an underlying issue with referee Tony Brothers that was the reason behind him being ejected from Friday's game against the Boston Celtics.

headline.main: Unknown Issue With Referee Got Me Ejected: Anthony
headline.print_headline: Unknown Issue With Referee Got Me Ejected: Anthony
